trans-unit.source: You can obtain information about the Network Server, such as version and current property values, Java information, and <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database server information, by using the <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> utility.

seg-source.mrk: You can obtain information about the Network Server, such as version and current property values, Java information, and <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database server information, by using the <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> utility.

target.mrk: You can obtain information about the Network Server, such as version and current property values, Java information, and <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database server information, by using the <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> utility.

trans-unit.source: The <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> utility is available from scripts, the command line, and the NetworkServerControl API.

seg-source.mrk: The <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> utility is available from scripts, the command line, and the NetworkServerControl API.

target.mrk: The <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> utility is available from scripts, the command line, and the NetworkServerControl API.

trans-unit.source: The following scripts are located in the <codeph>$<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>/bin</codeph> directory. Before running these scripts, make sure that the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server is started.

seg-source.mrk: The following scripts are located in the <codeph>$<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>/bin</codeph> directory.
Before running these scripts, make sure that the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server is started.

target.mrk: The following scripts are located in the <codeph>$<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph>/bin</codeph> directory.
Before running these scripts, make sure that the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Server is started.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> utility, see the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citutilities"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: You can also use Java Management Extensions (JMX) technology to obtain system information. For details, see <xref href="cadminjmxoverview.dita#cadminjmxoverview"></xref>.
